pages.text: In this page you can upgrade artifacts using the artifact exp you generated from the exp conversion tab.$(br2)Place the artifact you want to upgrade in the central slot, then click the upward arrow button to upgrade.$(br2)This tab will display the required player levels and artifact exp, which will be consumed.
It will also display the current artifact stats and stat types. When you upgrade the artifact, the gained main stat and sub stat values will also be displayed for a short time.
